infoPlist.NSContactsUsageDescription: Bubblepop needs access to access your contacts to display contact information.  Otherwise you'll just see a number.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Bubblepop needs access to your camera to read the join code.
infoPlist.NSLocationUsageDescription: Bubblepop needs access to your location to find local phone numbers.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Bubblepop needs access to your location to find local phone numbers.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: Bubblepop needs access to your location to find local phone numbers.
